name: garr-garrbox
author: GARR
summary: A Shibboleth2 puppet module that installs and configures GlusterFS for Garrbox.

parameters.name: url
parameters.doc: The URL for the REST service

parameters.name: body
parameters.doc: The body for the POST request

parameters.name: user
parameters.doc: The user to connect to the REST service

parameters.name: password
parameters.doc: The password to connect to the REST service

parameters.name: check_field_name
parameters.doc: The field name to be checked to verify the sync status of the resource

parameters.name: check_field_value
parameters.doc: The field value to be checked to verify the sync status of the resource

parameters.name: check_different
parameters.doc: A flag indicating wether the check must verify equality or difference

properties.name: ensure
properties.doc: Whether the resource is in sync or not.

types.name: post_restapi
types.doc: Executes a POST to a REST API
